description:
The Deluxe Edition contains:
Deep Space Explorer Armor

3 Nomad Skins (1 available now; 2 in May 2017)

Multiplayer Booster Pack
Jump-start your multiplayer co-op play with a booster pack. Includes five 50% XP Boosters (entitled instantly, limit 1 per match).

2 Pathfinder Casual Outfits (1 available now; 1 in May 2017)

Scavenger Armor
Don a unique look for the Pathfinder while exploring dangerous, new planets.

Pathfinder Elite Weapon Set (4)
Shoot your way through Andromeda with this unique set of weapons.

Pet Pyjak
Everyone’s favorite space monkey is back and can join you aboard the Tempest.

Digital Soundtrack

Multiplayer Deluxe Launch Pack - Get a head start on Day 1 co-op play with the Multiplayer Launch Pack, which includes items to kick start your progress (entitled instantly).

HDR enhanced for richer, more luminous colors. HDR functionality available on Xbox One S with supported games and TVs.
shortDescription:
The Deluxe Edition contains:
Deep Space Explorer Armor
Nomad Skins (3)
Multiplayer Booster Pack
Pathfinder Casual Outfit (2)
Scavenger Armor
Pathfinder Elite Weapon Set (4)
Pet Pyjak
Digital Soundtrack
Multiplayer Deluxe Launch Pack
title: Mass Effect™: Andromeda Deluxe Edition
